CustomField.description: This is the error message that was received by the BAM Camunda integration when an error occurs in the CSSO flow. This could also include when the user does not respond to the invitation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the error message that was received by the BAM Camunda integration when an error occurs in the CSSO flow. This could also include when the user does not respond to the invitation.
CustomField.label: BAM CSSO Error Message
